job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Holtsville, New York<br><br><strong>Skills : </strong>Python software developer,Python,developer,python developer,Software engineer,Software,Engineer,Automation,Automative engineer<br><br><strong><u>Description<br><br></u></strong><strong>Position Details:<br><br></strong><strong>Job Title</strong><strong> - </strong><strong>Software Engineer I<br><br></strong><strong>Location</strong><strong> - </strong><strong>Holtsville, NY<br><br></strong><strong>Duration</strong><strong> - </strong><strong>4+ Months (Possible Extension)<br><br></strong><strong><u>Description<br></u></strong><ul><li>The tasking involves setting up and programming a Universal Robotic (UR) arm and gripper to pick up grocery items and move them across the plane of a scanner as performed by a human checker.</li><li>The UR robot and table are large so this tasking would be in the Holtsville Facility.</li><li>For safety and security reasons, this tasking can't be fully performed remotely and the candidate would need to be in office.</li><li>The sample set of test items is large.</li><li>Some training is involved, but the candidate must have some experience with robots and robotic control so the training is limited.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Required Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Develops and implements software systems or applications through the use of software best practices such as Specification, Design, Coding, Testing, Documentation, and Maintenance.</li><li>Knowledge of Development Environments, Configuration Management Tools, and Operating systems is expected.</li><li>Bachelor's degree in an appropriate engineering discipline required.</li><li>Minimum of 0-2 years of engineering experience.</li><li>Some experience in Python/Script programming and Robots.</li></ul>
